ratings.comment: Thomas Bunting is an amazing lecturer. Very accessible outside of class. Cares about his students greatly.

Such a great professor. He made the topic very interesting. He has quite a dry sense of humor, but he makes us all laugh every class. Most enjoyable lecture I took this semester! There is a lot of reading, but it's all pretty interesting content, and his reviews of the readings are super interesting!

One of the best instructors I've ever had. At the beginning of the course he wasn't very clear about how to structure papers and what he wanted in them, but after he graded the first papers he made it really clear what he wanted and it was super easy to get an A if you put in the work. He has a really dry sense of humor and it's hilarious.
I haven't seen his T&A in a few years. But it was solid. He's the kind of teacher who wouldn't send you home for not bringing a hat to baseball practice.
Awesome TA.  Really encourages discussion in his sections.  Makes material and discussion interesting and entertaining.  Definitely recommend.
Super smart guy, knows his stuff. Entertaining and funny. Would highly recommend this course.
Very funny. Knows his stuff. Helpful.
Really funny and knowledgeable guy, really interesting sections. Can spot people who don't read for the class from a mile off. Definitely one of my favorite TAs
